summary: A young peasant, with no interest in adventure or fortune, is mistaken as the kingdom's only hope when a horrible monster threatens the countryside.
cast: Michael Palin|Harry H. Corbett|John Le Mesurier|Warren Mitchell|Max Wall|Rodney Bewes|John Bird|Bernard Bresslaw|Antony Carrick|Peter Cellier|Deborah Fallender|Derek Francis|Terry Gilliam|Neil Innes|Terry Jones|Bryan Pringle|Frank Williams|Glenn Williams|Simon Williams|Annette Badland|Kenneth Colley|Brenda Cowling|Graham Crowden|Paul Curran|Alexandra Dane|Brian Glover|Jerold Wells|Tony Aitken|Peter Casillas|Derrick O'Connor|Derek Deadman|Janine Duvitski|Roy Evans|Bill Gavin|Harold Goodwin|John Gorman|Julian Hough|Des Jones|Gorden Kaye|Christopher Logue|Dan Muir|David Prowse|Gordon Rollings|Sheridan Earl Russell|Peter Salmon|Hilary Sesta|John Sharp|George Silver|Tony Sympson|Sydney Bromley|John Blain|Erik Chitty|Peggy Ann Clifford|Terry English|Willoughby Goddard|Sarah Grazebrook|John Hughman|Anthony Lang|Reg Lye|Mollie Maureen|Roger Pratt|Bob Raymond|Anita Sharp-Bolster|Kenneth Thornett|Ann Way|Fred Wood
title: La bestia del reino
